attributes.action: Lower Working Tax Credit Age Eligibility From 25 To 18
attributes.additional_details: We all pay taxes from when we start earning, so the government should lower the working tax threshold to age 18 for anyone working full time. People work the same hours and do the same job as others, and pick up less. A level playing fiels is required, and the tax payers money can be put to good use and given to people who pay into it!
